source_caption_data.pre_caption: This video captures a sweeping landscape scenery shot, beginning with a view of a vibrant rainbow arcing across a dramatic sky filled with a mix of dark, heavy clouds and patches of bright blue. The camera then tilts downward to reveal a sprawling, verdant landscape of rolling hills covered in lush green trees and foliage. There is no single main subject, as the composition emphasizes the grand scale and atmospheric beauty of the natural environment. The focus is on the striking visual of the rainbow over the expansive terrain rather than any specific object within it.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt:
The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject. Please concisely specify the type of scenery shot (e.g., a landscape or cityscape scenery shot) in a single fluent paragraph.Also explain why there is no main subject, such as the focus being on the environment, atmosphere, or scale rather than a specific object. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.

Please avoid using phrases like "the first frame" or "the last frame" in your description. Instead, refer to the entire sequence simply as "the video." Your description should integrate observations from all frames into a cohesive, temporally and logically consistent narrative, rather than describing frames in isolation. Whenever you mention a subject, be sure to include detailed descriptions of its key visual attributes. The final output should be a single, fluent paragraph describing the video, with no Markdown formatting or introductory text. Don't mention the surroundings or the subject's motion unless necessary to distinguish subjects by location, action, or relationship.

generated_critique: The camera smoothly tilts downward and pans to the right, effectively revealing the lush greenery of the landscape. A small group of people can be seen walking along a narrow dirt path near the center of the scene.
revised_caption_by_generated_critique: This video captures a sweeping landscape scenery shot, beginning with a view of a vibrant rainbow arcing across a dramatic sky filled with a mix of dark, heavy clouds and patches of bright blue. The camera smoothly tilts downward and pans to the right, effectively revealing a sprawling, verdant landscape of rolling hills covered in lush green trees and foliage. Near the center of the scene, a small group of people can be seen walking along a narrow dirt path, adding a sense of scale to the grand natural environment. The focus remains on the striking visual of the rainbow over the expansive terrain.
